name: Princess' Pit
description:
This Game's deliberate broken mechanics makes the game experience weird and fun. If you are unable to win at first just retry... (hint: R)
The level's walls will regenerate thus every time you play the level is unique.

The inspiration is the difficulty of the Pogostic toy, wich to us seems almost impossible to ballance... add force and things starts to get crazy!

You might even lose your head or win by accident!

This game won the Voyager Award at Create Jam Fall Edition 2016

Our team name Cheval, is the french word for horse... which seemed strangely fitting.
